verses.roman:
eka-dina rūpa karena nāṭaka likhana
ācambite mahāprabhura haila āgamana

synonyms: eka-dina—one day; rūpa—Rūpa Gosvāmī; karena—does; nāṭaka—drama; likhana—writing; ācambite—all of a sudden; mahāprabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; haila—there was; āgamana—the coming.
translation: One day while Rūpa Gosvāmī was writing his book, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu suddenly appeared.
